original: Maggārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa.

original: Maggārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā chabbīsa …pe… avigate chabbīsa.
